import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './AddMarks.css'; function AddMarks() { let percentage = null; let totalValue = 0; let [total, setTotal] = useState(0) let math = 0; let chem = 0; let phy = 0; const mathScore = (event) => { math = parseFloat((event.target.value)) percentageCalc() } const phyScore = (event) => { phy = parseFloat((event.target.value)) percentageCalc() } const chemScore = (event) => { chem = parseFloat((event.target.value)) percentageCalc() } const percentageCalc = () => { if (chem && phy && math ) { totalValue = math + phy + chem } console.log(totalValue) } return (
